original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Valentines Collection
overview: Love, laughs and mischief are in the air with Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Valentines Collection. Along with 4 additional episodes and a Valentine Special Bonus from the classic Alvin Show, this collection is one you're sure to fall in love with!
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Valentines Collection
